alert.note: Alert for Eastern Hampden; Eastern Hampshire; Western Hampden (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 12:20AM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Hampshire, southwestern Franklin and northwestern Hampden Counties through 100 AM EDT... At 1220 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Chester, or 14 miles northwest of Westfield, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Locations impacted include... Holyoke, Northampton, South Hadley, Easthampton, Southampton, Hadley, Hatfield, Williamsburg, Huntington, Conway, Westhampton, Whately, Chester, Blandford, Chesterfield, Worthington, Goshen and Middlefield. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Hampden; Eastern Hampshire; Western Hampden
